channel.title: Run source automaticly
channel.description: hey guys, i got my own server and everything is good got over 26 players now :) i got 1 question: when other want to play i must run the source manuly how to you guys keep it run even if i shutdown the pc?

item.title: Run source automaticly
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Kamran1, post:11, topic:515904”][quote author=Jmood link=topic=634158.msg4282676#msg4282676 date=1365914282]

waht about the remote desktop pc?

RDP is for allowing you to connect to allow Windows computer, it will not allow you to run your server when you shut off your computer. If you wish to run your server and shut your computer down you will have to buy a VPS or another computer to keep running.
[/quote]

By using Remote Desktop it allows you to access controls of your pc so yes you could turn the server on with it, if you have an iPhone you can download Splashtop which is a Remote Desktop app[/quote]

The OP asked for a way to run the source while his computer is off, not run it from another location. Like I said if you wish to run the source while allowing you to shut your computer down you will either have to set up another computer or buy a vps.

Read full topic

item.title: Run source automaticly
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

If you want to run 24/7 you either have to keep your computer on 24/7 or buy a vps which is another computer that you can connect to remotely from the company you purchased it from and it stays on. All you gotta do is transfer the files over and re-download java, no-ip - login again so it will connect to the same ip

Read full topic

item.title: Run source automaticly
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Again. It is impossible to use any system while it is OFF!
Go to a game console, or your computer, and take out the power cord (if a laptop the power cord and battery). Then try to use it. Don’t plug anything back in. Doesn’t work well does it? That’s what you are trying to do here.
A VPS, is a computer that’s managed elsewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Run source automaticly
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:10, topic:515904”][quote author=noor359 link=topic=634158.msg4282673#msg4282673 date=1365914023]
waht about the remote desktop pc?
[/quote]

RDP is for allowing you to connect to allow Windows computer, it will not allow you to run your server when you shut off your computer. If you wish to run your server and shut your computer down you will have to buy a VPS or another computer to keep running.[/quote]

By using Remote Desktop it allows you to access controls of your pc so yes you could turn the server on with it, if you have an iPhone you can download Splashtop which is a Remote Desktop app

Read full topic

item.title: Run source automaticly

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

noor359:

waht about the remote desktop pc?

RDP is for allowing you to connect to allow Windows computer, it will not allow you to run your server when you shut off your computer. If you wish to run your server and shut your computer down you will have to buy a VPS or another computer to keep running.

item.title: Run source automaticly

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You can’t shut something off and expect it to work lol.
That’d be like taking the plug out of the wall and wondering why your computer doesn’t turn on.
